name: pirsch-php-proxy
description: A self-hosted proxy for the Pirsch Analytics JavaScript snippet.

scripts.build: esbuild pa.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pa.min.js && esbuild pirsch.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pirsch.min.js && esbuild pirsch-events.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pirsch-events.min.js && esbuild pirsch-sessions.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pirsch-sessions.min.js

author: Emvi Software GmbH
